actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: Resolution recognizing all speedways as essential businesses and calling on local authorities and governors to work with racetrack owners and stakeholders to commence outdoor races immediately.
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: This resolution recognizes all speedways as essential businesses and calls on local authorities and governors to work with racetrack owners and stakeholders to commence outdoor races immediately.
